subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: TORONTO, Sept. 18 (AP) — A. J. Burnett came within one out of a complete game and Russ Adams drove in the go-ahead run with a two-run double in the eighth inning, leading the Toronto Blue Jays past the faltering Boston Red Sox, 4-3, last night.
snippet: TORONTO, Sept. 18 (AP) — A. J. Burnett came within one out of a complete game and Russ Adams drove in the go-ahead run with a two-run double in the eighth inning, leading the Toronto Blue Jays past the faltering Boston Red Sox, 4-3, last night.
